messages.subject: Jim Trelease
messages.msgSnippet: The quote: (1) Books as gifts.  Bookstores, yard sales, and the Internet are all sources of books to enjoy.  Trelease made a joke of comparing a new $12 copy
messages.messageBody:
The quote:
(1) Books as gifts. Bookstores, yard sales, and the Internet are all
sources of books to enjoy. Trelease made a joke of comparing a new $12
copy of Charlotte's Web with one found at a yard sale for 25 cents.
"They have the same words!" he said.

I'm so thrilled to know he feels that way since I bought all of his books at
"Half-Price Books". I just love books about books! Have a whole shelf of
them.

Becky
